ing: 1 cup roasted red peppers, drained and chopped
n: Corn and Roasted Red Pepper Salad
des: "This sweet-and-sour corn salad makes a great accompaniment for any Tex-Mex meal."
ins: Combine corn, red wine vinegar, red peppers, cilantro, sugar, olive oil, cumin, red pepper flakes, chili powder, and ginger together in a saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring frequently to dissolve the sugar. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook until the liquid evaporates, about 25 minutes.
